articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly Built Gasification Process
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly Built Gasification Process
Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the newly built gasification process at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					 After being briefed on the complex before a map showing its production process, he looked round various places of the gasification process for hours to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and production.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the gigantic gasification process built in the vast Namhung plain, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that another structure of eternal value was built to shine long along with the Songun era.
					
					  It is an astonishing miracle that the workers of Namhung and other builders successfully completed the vast construction project in a brief span of time by their own efforts and with their own technology, he said, highly estimating the feats they performed by building the great structure through display of popular heroism and patriotic devotion.
					
					 He noted that the feats the builders performed by successfully building the Korean-style gasification process and thus providing a priceless treasure conducive to the improvement of the standard of people's living and the prosperity of the country would be brilliantly recorded in the history of building a thriving nation. 
					
					  The mass-production of Juche-oriented fertilizers through the completion of the above-said project in the wake of a great auspicious event of vinalon industry means another great event for the whole country as it brought hope and optimism that the day of victory in the drive for building a thriving nation is soon to come when all the people will enjoy great happiness. 
					
					 Watching heaps of fertilizers in the yard of the forwarding shop, he was very pleased that now it is possible to supply great quantities of fertilizers to the countryside. 
					
					 He went round supply service facilities including a modern workers dormitory and comprehensive welfare service facilities to take warm care of the workers' living.
					
					 He showed great loving care and benevolence, noting that the workers in the DPRK high in the revolutionary spirit and strong in the sense of organization and discipline should take the lead in creating a new culture, too. 
					
					 He advanced important tasks to be carried out by the complex to manage and operate it. 
					
					 Now is the time to wage a general offensive campaign involving the whole party, a general mobilization campaign involving the whole state and an all-people decisive drive and powerfully demonstrate once again the heroic spirit of the Korean people who know nothing impossible, he noted, calling on all the Party members and other working people to emerge honorable victors in the drive to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Expressing great expectation and conviction that the workers of Namhung would creditably play the role as vanguard and a shock brigade in the drive for a great surge in the future, too, he had a photo session with labor innovators.
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Kim Ki Nam, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Jang Song Thaek and First Vice Department Directors Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Hyong Jik
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Hyong Jik
						
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the statue of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and an outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, in Ponghwa-ri, Kangdong County, Pyongyang and before his grave in Mangyongdae on Saturday on the occasion of the 84th anniversary of his death.
					 Seen before the statue and grave were wreaths from 
					
					Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop and others, officials of party and power organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, working people and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Placed before the statue and the grave were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths in the name of ministries, national institutions, revolutionary schools, education and public health institutions and party and power organs, enterprises, farms and schools in Pyongyang and bunches of flowers.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kim Hyong Jik who devoted all his life to the sacred cause of independence of the country and freedom and liberation of the people with the steadfast spirit of national independence and the anti-Japanese patriotic idea.
					
					 Wreaths and bouquets were also laid before his statues at Kim Hyong Jik Military Medical University and in Sakju County, North Phyongan Province and Junggang County, Jagang Province.

articles.title: Mass Rallies to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
Mass Rallies to Condemn Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in South Phyongan and North Hamgyong provinces on June 4 and 5 to slam the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea for their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 The rallies were attended by officials of local party and power bodies, social organizations, institutions at all levels, industrial establishments and farms, working people, youth and students.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that linking the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking with the DPRK is an infringement upon its dignity and sovereignty as the case was fabricated by the Lee group under the patronage of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The puppet traitors are going reckless in a bid to prolong their remaining days while cooking up such sinister plots, but this is no more than a pipedream, they said, warning that the DPRK will force the enemies to pay dearly if they dare provoke it.
					
					 They said that they would resolutely frustrate the reckless war moves of the U.S. and Japanese aggressors and the south Korean bellicose forces with firm assurance that the DPRK will always emerge victorious as it has the powerful military muscle.
					
					 They expressed the resolution to courageously come out to wipe out the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean group of traitors, if they ignite a war, and surely build a reunified and prosperous power for the whole nation in this land.
					
					 Meanwhile, similar rallies are taking place in cities and counties day after day.

articles.title: Foreigners and Overseas Compatriots Here
articles.content:
Foreigners and Overseas Compatriots Here
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Ezzat Abdel-Bary, secretary general of the Federation of Afro-Asian Insurers and Reinsurers and his party arrived here today to participate in the Pyongyang International Insurance Seminar.
					 Also arriving here today were representatives of companies of China, Switzerland, the United Arab Emirates, Britain and India and a delegation of the Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.
					
					 Earlier arrivals include Roberto Quinto Martinez, permanent secretariat of the Association of Insurance and Reinsurance in Developing Countries, and representatives of companies of Morocco, Sudan and Egypt.

articles.title: Performance of "Echo of Mountain" Begins in Nampho
articles.content:
Performance of "Echo of Mountain" Begins in Nampho
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The performance of light comedy "Echo of Mountain", a winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, started in Nampho City on Saturday.
					 Leading officials of party, power, working people's organizations and economic organs, creators, artistes and working people of all strata in the city enjoyed the performance at the Nampho Theatre. 
					
					 The artistes of the State Theatrical Troupe gave truthful and vivid representation of the unique emotion of the socialist countryside and truth of life.
					
					 The audience was deeply impressed by the performance as it successfully represented through joyful laughing and nimble jests the noble spiritual world, sublime ideal and indomitable struggle of the Korean people of the Chollima era.
					
					 The performance helped the audience harden the conviction that there is nothing undoable and they can surely build a thriving nation of Juche in this land when they fully display the revolutionary optimism and enterprising fighting spirit with high aims. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: Environmental Protection Goes on
articles.content:
Environmental Protection Goes on
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea stipulates that the state takes measures for the protection of environment prior to production, preserves and creates natural environment, and prevents environmental pollution, thus providing cultured and hygienic conditions of life and labor to the people.
					 On this basis, the DPRK has taken measures to protect natural environment and increased state investment for this purpose, paying a primary attention to the promotion of the people's health.
					
					 Effective gas and dust collection devices and sewage disposal facilities have been introduced to prevent or considerably reduce the environmental pollution from production, construction and development.      A nationwide network has been set up to regularly observe and analyze the environmental condition of the country, including atmosphere and water.
					
					 In spring and autumn seasons, good species of trees are planted in mountains, villages and streets, and rivers and roads improved through a nationwide campaign.
					
					 A forest-fire monitoring system is working with the help of satellite, forestation and forest conservation, including the protection of trees from damage by harmful insects, have been carried on in a planned way and nature preservation areas designated and put under good care. 
					
					 Besides, minor power stations have been built in all parts of the country, natural energy including solar heat and wind power utilized to reduce the greenhouse gas emissions, and barrages and dams erected in rivers, riverbeds dredged and bank-protecting forests created in a far-sighted way.
					
					 In order to cope with such international problems as climate change, destruction of ozone layer, decrease of biodiversity, desertification and dust storm, the DPRK has promoted cooperation and interchange with various international organizations and other countries.
					
					 On the occasion of the World Environment Day (June 5), a national seminar on the protection of biodiversity and other colorful functions are to be held in the DPRK.

articles.title: 6.15 North Accuses Ultra-right Conservative Media in S. Korea
articles.content:
6.15 North Accuses Ultra-right Conservative Media in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Press Panel of the North Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on June 5 denouncing the south Korean ultra-right conservative media for zealously joining the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The ultra-right conservative media including Chosun Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo are malignantly defiling the dignity and system of the DPRK and fanning up a war fever, toeing the policies of their U.S. and Japanese masters and the puppet conservative groups who orchestrated the unprecedented hideous anti-DPRK farce. Moreover, they are busy labeling progressive media and the righteous pro-reunification patriotic figures demanding a probe into the truth behind the warship case as "enemy-benefiting elements" and "pro-north leftists" in a bid to mislead public opinion at home and abroad. 
					
					 These behaviors are nothing but disgraceful ones contrary to the mission of media and a blatant violation and challenge to the agreement reached among media organizations in the north and the south to conduct positive media activities to contribute to national unity and reunification.
					
					 A media organization forsaken by the public for ignoring the spirit of the era can never speak for justice and truth even though it has a pen or mike in hand, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday which way the media forsaken by the public will go while shutting its eyes to justice and pursuing instead injustice as a waiting maid to serve the authorities in pursuit of its own luxury. 
					
					 The results of the recent "elections to local self-governing bodies" constitute a telling blow dealt by the south Korean people at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors and, at the same time, an expression of extreme disillusionment and anger at the conservative media which zealously backed the fascist dictatorship and the moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 No matter how hard the conservative media may work to falsify truth, misrepresent justice and make a mockery of the public mind-set, it can never hold in check the dynamic march of all the Koreans for independence and reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself". 
					
					 The south Korean conservative media had better bear deep in mind that only a miserable end awaits them as they turn their faces away from the public mind-set, oblivious of the calls of the era and history.

articles.title: Newspapers on Results of "Local Elections"
articles.content:
Newspapers on Results of "Local Elections"
Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- It was a due outcome that the democratic forces in south Korea won a landslide victory in the "elections to local self-governing bodies" and the "Grand National Party" suffered a heavy defeat, observe leading newspapers Saturday in their commentaries.
					 This represents a victory of the forces for independence, democracy and reunification over the pro-U.S. conservative group and a resolute judgment of the people's mindset, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on: 
					
					 Through the "elections" the south Korean people declared a total bankruptcy of the sycophantic and treacherous, fascist and anti-reunification domestic and foreign policies pursued by the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 The anti-"government" struggle which was triggered off by the mass candlelight demonstrations against the import of American beef resumed by the "regime under the cloak of pragmatism" proved to be a stern judgment meted out to the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors through the "elections to local self-governing bodies".
					
					 The results of the said "elections" prove that unshakable is the will of the south Korean people to put an end to the treacherous policies ignoring the people's mindset and bring down the hateful "regime veiled with the word of pragmatism" at any cost.
					
					 The conservative group was thrown into such crisis and uneasiness before the "elections" that it kicked up confrontation and war hysteria after linking the case of the warship sinking with the DPRK at any cost in a bid to divert elsewhere the public attention and win the "elections." It, however, could not blindfold the people and stop their ears. By inflicting a bitter defeat on the group of traitors in the "elections", the south Korean people dealt sledgehammer blows at the puppet authorities hell-bent on the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK after orchestrating the warship case. 
					
					 Minju Joson says it is the mindset of the south Korean people that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should step down without delay as it has done only bad things.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Frantic Moves for War Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
Chongryon Denounces Lee Myung Bak Group's Frantic Moves
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements on May 31 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their war moves against the DPRK.
					 Kim Hak Bok, chairman of the Kyoto prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, noted that Koreans in Japan could not repress their surging anger at the south Korean group of traitors who cooked up the case of warship "Cheonan" sinking, an unprecedented fabrication, bringing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and escalating the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 He stressed that the headquarters would more dynamically arouse broad strata of compatriots to a nationwide struggle for resolutely frustrating the south Korean conservative group's moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Jong Hui Gyong, chairperson of the Kanagawa prefectural headquarters of Chongryon, called upon all the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas to mete out a stern judgment to the sycophants and traitors working with bloodshot eyes to bring all sorts of misfortune and sufferings to them in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artistes in Japan, declared that the Koreans would never pardon the Lee group of traitors who have committed acts of treachery by bringing the June 15 era of reconciliation and cooperation, a fruition of the desire and will of all the fellow countrymen, and the inter-Korean relations which had dynamically advanced in the idea of "By our nation itself" to those before the publication of the June 15 joint declaration by engineering a despicable farce and stepping up war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, stated the organization would resolutely smash the moves frantically stepped up by the group of traitors to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK, rendering the situation so tense that a war may break out any moment.

articles.title: Unpopular Policy Censured in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unpopular Policy Censured in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- "The Buddhist Solidarity for Keeping Four Large Rivers Alive" and "the All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Project of Destroying Four Large Rivers" in south Korea separately held press conferences in Seoul on Tuesday urging the puppet authorities to stop the unpopular projects for "improving four large rivers".
					 The organizations recalled at the conferences that on May 31 a priest committed a self-immolation, leaving a suicide note, adding that this was strong protest and resistance against the Lee Myung Bak regime which is seriously devastating the life-giving rivers to satisfy its greed.
					
					 They declared they would turn out in the actions against the above-said projects so that the death of the priest might not be in vain, demanding Lee Myung Bak apologize to the victim and cancel the projects without delay.
					
					 Members of the Teachers Trade Union (Jongyojo) of south Korea on May 28 staged a demonstration in Seoul in protest against the puppet authorities' fascist crackdown.
					
					 They stressed that Jongyojo, as a legitimate teachers' trade union, would fight to the last against the unpopular education policy of the authorities for the sake of the children and the proper education.

articles.title: Russian and Indonesian Media on Truth about "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Russian and Indonesian Media on Truth about "Cheonan"
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Russian internet news and an Indonesian newspaper carried articles on the truth about the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking.
					 The Russian Internet News Ruskiye Novosti in an article carried on Tuesday under the title "U.S. trace left on 'north's torpedo'" said that the warship "Cheonan" was sunken by a U.S. torpedo, according to a reconnaissance source of the Pacific Fleet of Russia.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The groundless evidence produced by the "team for investigation" into the case of the warship "Cheonan's" sinking is arousing strong criticism.
					
					 To begin with, why only U.S. allies were included in the "investigation team" while such important countries as Russia and China were not allowed to participate in it and the proposal for dispatching an inspection group of the DPRK was turned down without any clear reason.
					
					 After all, the "investigation team" willfully interpreted the "torpedo wreckage".
					
					 It is also doubtful that the torpedo got heavily rusted though it exploded in March.  
					
					 It is very strange that a submarine of the DPRK tactfully disappeared, keeping itself away from anti-submarine crafts of the U.S. and south Korea equipped with underwater sound detectors, satellite monitoring systems and underwater detectors, which took part in the joint maneuvers in those days including the warship "Cheonan." 
					
					 It was hardly understandable, too, that they had kept silent for nearly two months since the outbreak of the incident, the possible explosion due to an accident aboard the warship or mine was ignored and all officers survived the case, etc.
					
					 It is hardly understandable either that south Korea kicked off a hysteric racket while vociferating about "punishment" and "retaliation", far from clarifying its assertion and evidence after the publication of the "results of investigation", gradually made a step back by uttering "apology" and "punishment of those responsible" and is now making such provocation as declaring its will to set up loudspeakers only to make the DPRK to threaten to preempt its firing at south Korea in a bid to brand it as an" aggressor".
					
					 The reconnaissance source of the Pacific Fleet of Russia claimed it is true that "Cheonan" was sunken by a torpedo but it was not done by "a torpedo of the north" but a special torpedo launched by the U.S. latest nuclear-powered submarine with the help of a small underwater device. 
					
					 The escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula is not beneficial to both the north and the south but beneficial to the U.S. only.
					
					 The U.S. is attempting to establish a worldwide nuclear arms control regime on the plea of nuclear disarmament.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is stuck in Iraq and Afghanistan, it seeks to use "other's hands" by changing its tactics. In other words, the U.S. seeks to pressurize south Korea to shoulder the burden of stifling the DPRK in a bid to "preserve its image." It was also the calculation of the U.S. that it could put China in an awkward position and split the DPRK from China.
					
					 On the same day the Indonesian newspaper Kompas in an article titled "Was 'Cheonan' sunken by 'the north's torpedo' or torpedo of U.S. forces?" said that the warship's sinking still remains a riddle.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. joint military maneuvers were at their height in the waters where the warship was sunken. Accordingly, the security was firmly guaranteed and the warship was also involved in those military maneuvers. 
					
					 It is nonsensical for warships of south Korea and the U.S. involved in the military maneuvers to claim they were unaware of "Cheonan's" sinking.
					
					  There is also the possibility that "Cheonan" might be sunken by a U.S. forces submarine.
					
					 It is necessary to remind that a U.S. nuclear-powered submarine involved in the joint military maneuvers was on a secret combat duty in the waters near Paekryong Islet in the day the case occurred.

articles.title: DPRK's Achievements Praised by Laos PM
articles.content:
DPRK's Achievements Praised by Laos PM
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Boun Thong Chitmani, member of the Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and chairman of its Organization Commission, who visited the DPRK at the  head of its delegation, gave the following impression of it:
					 We visited the Party Founding Museum and the Tower of the Juche Idea during our stay in Pyongyang.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung laid a foundation for party founding in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The world knows no such prominent statesman and great leader as Kim Il Sung. 
					
					The exploits performed by him in the party building are glorified by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people, single-mindedly united around Kim Jong Il, have achieved great successes in all fields under the banner of the Juche idea.
					
					 While touring various places, we witnessed the appearance of rich and powerful socialist Korea. 
					
					 I was immensely excited to visit the International Friendship Exhibition House.
					
					 On display at the exhibition house are gifts presented by heads of party and state and people from all walks of life of many countries.
					
					 The gifts are associated with the profound reverence of the world people for Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We were deeply impressed to visit the modern e-library and the indoor swimming pool at Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 The visit offered us an opportunity to know well about the profound care the party and the state have shown for the development of the education of the university and the promotion of the health of its teachers and students.
					
					 The DPRK will surely shine as a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation. 
					
					  We wish the fraternal Korean people greater success in the future under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Smear Campaign Condemned
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Smear Campaign Condemned
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea issued a statement on May 29 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK smear campaign launched by the Lee Myung Bak group. 
					 The statement noted that Korea's reunification is nowadays facing a grave challenge due to the moves of the Lee group escalating inter-Korean confrontation under the pretext of the case of the warship "Cheonan's" sinking.
					
					 The committee strongly denounces the moves of the Lee group against reunification, it said, demanding it stop at once the vicious anti-DPRK campaign.
					
					 It stressed that the committee fully supports the stand of the DPRK as regards the case and extends firm solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people for the reunification of the country and the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party of Kyrgyzstan issued a statement on May 31 in which it demanded the U.S. immediately get its hands off the DPRK.
					
					 On May 27, the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru also issued a statement strongly assailing the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their shameless moves of threatening global peace and fanning up a war atmosphere on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, also issued a statement on the same day denouncing the smear campaign of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors against the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Building Socialism Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Building Socialism Supported
 Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- The Lao party and government warmly congratulate the Korean people on their successes achieved in defending the country and carrying out the cause of building socialism under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Bouasone Bouphavanh, prime minister of Laos, said this on May 31 when meeting with the DPRK ambassador to his country who paid a courtesy call on him.
					
					 Laos always supports the Korean people's cause of building socialism, the prime minister said, adding that the successes gained by the Korean people serve as a precious experience and great encouragement to the Lao people aspiring after socialism.
					
					 He said that the Lao party and government support the Korean people's efforts for the peaceful reunification of the country and the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula and expressed apprehension over the fact that the imperialist hostile forces are escalating their threat and sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the peninsula should be solved peacefully through negotiations, he urged.
					
					 He wished the Korean people great successes in building socialism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Start of Work at WPK Marked
Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar was held in Guinea and film shows took place in Russia, Ukraine and the Czech Republic from May 24 to 28 on the occasion of the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "For Liberation of the Country" and "Reply of Korea".
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea explained that Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" enjoys warm support and sympathy from the countries and peoples struggling for independence for its scientific accuracy and truth and displays great vitality. 
					
					 He noted that the reality of the DPRK proves that it is a true way of carving out the destiny of the country and the nation to preserve the Juche character and national identity. 
					
					 The general director of the Stroimashintorg Company in Russia said that the leadership of Kim Jong Il has been fully established in all spheres including economy and culture, not confined to party affairs, and fresh miracles have been worked in socialist construction in the DPRK one after another.
					
					 The Korean people are confidently advancing along the road of building a thriving nation chosen by themselves under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, he said, sincerely wishing the Korean people success in their drive to augment the national defence capability and build a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el proceso de gasificacion construido nuevamente en el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung.
					Luego de escuchar la explicacion ante el plano del proceso de produccion, se entero detalladamente del estado de construccion y produccion recorriendo durante largo tiempo varios objetos que componen el proceso de gasificacion.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que se haya creado otro patrimonio, que se transmitira eternamente junto con la epoca del Songun, viendo el proceso de gasificacion levantado gigantescamente en la extensa llanura de Namhung.
					
					Es un milagro sorprendente que la clase obrera de Namhung y otros constructores hayan terminado con exito en un corto tiempo esa gran obra con las fuerzas y tecnicas propias, senalo y aprecio altamente los meritos de ellos que levantaron esta grandiosa creacion empleando su heroismo colectivo y abnegacion patriotica.
					
					Destaco que se registraran en letras doradas en la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera los meritos de los constructores quienes prepararon la valiosa riqueza para la mejora de la vida del pueblo y la prosperidad de la patria al construir magnificamente el proceso de gasificacion al estilo coreano.
					
					Apunto que la produccion cuantiosa del abono Juche, que se hizo posible gracias al termino de la obra, despues del gran jubilo nacional que ha traido la produccion en avalanchas de vinalon, constituye otra gran fiesta de todo el pais que siembra en todo el pueblo la esperanza y el optimismo de que llegara en un futuro no lejano el dia de triunfo de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera en que inundara la felicidad.
					
					Al ver el monton de abono en el cargadero del taller de expedicion, el Dirigente se puso muy contento diciendo que ya se puede suministrar al campo mucha cantidad de fertilizantes.
					
					  A continuacion, atendio cordialmente la vida de los obreros recorriendo las instalaciones de intendencia construidas modernamente como el albergue de obreros y las facilidades de servicios generales.
					
					Diciendo que nuestros obreros muy revolucionarios, organizados y disciplinados deben ponerse al frente tambien en la creacion de la nueva cultura, les dispenso grandes benevolencias.
					
					  El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la administracion de la empresa.
					
					  Ahora es cuando hay que volver a demostrar el impetu heroico de nuestro pueblo, que no conoce la imposibilidad, mediante la ofensiva general de todo el partido, la movilizacion general de todo el Estado y la lucha general de todo el pueblo, apunto.
					
					  Enfatizo que todos los militantes del partido y trabajadores deben ser triunfadores orgullosos en la gran causa para construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  Se fotografio junto a los innovadores laborales expresando su gran esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los obreros de Namhung cumpliran magnificamente el papel de vanguardia y brigada de avanzada en la produccion del gran auge.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Periodicos comentan el resultado de elecciones locales en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Periodicos comentan el resultado de elecciones locales en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron el dia 5 los comentarios individuales calificando de merecida la gran derrota del "Gran Partido Nacional" frente a las fuerzas progresistas en las "elecciones de la autonomia local" efectuadas en el Sur de Corea.
					  Esto deviene la victoria de las fuerzas aspirantes a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion y la sentencia tajante del pueblo a la banda conservadora proyanqui.
					
					  Asi senala el comentario individual del periodico Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					  Mediante las recientes "elecciones", los habitantes surcoreanos declararon el fracaso total de la politica interna y externa de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de caracter vendepatria, fascista y anti-reunificacion.
					
					  El clima de lucha anti-"gubernamental" propiciado con la manifestacion masiva con velas encendidas contra el reinicio de la importacion de la carne de es norteamericana por el "poder pragmatista" se concreto en la sentencia severa sobre la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak en esos comicios.
					
					  El resultado electoral demuestra que no se puede doblegar por nada la voluntad de los habitantes surcoreanos de poner fin a la politica traidora que da espaldas a la opinion publica y derrocar el abominable "poder pragmatista".
					
					  Esta vez, la banda conservadora, que se sentia critica e inquieta antes de las "elecciones", armo alborotos de enfrentamiento y guerra relacionando obstinadamente el caso del hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en sus desesperados esfuerzos por triunfar en las "elecciones" distrayendo la atencion de la opinion publica. 
					
					  Pero, nadie puede enganar al pueblo.
					
					  Mediante las "elecciones de autonomia local", la poblacion surcoreana castigo duro a las autoridades titeres enfrascadas en la campana conflictiva con la RPDC al hacerles sufrir la amarga derrota.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson senala que el pueblo surcoreano desea que se retire inmediatamente del poder la camarilla del traidor Lee Myung Bak que se dedica solo a las maldades.

articles.title: "Cheonan" fue hundido por torpedo de EE.UU., opinan medios extranjeros
articles.content:
"Cheonan" fue hundido por torpedo de EE.UU., opinan medios extranjeros
Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ATCC) -- La Agencia via Internet de Rusia "Ruskie Novosti" y el periodico indonesio "Compass" publicaron los articulos reveladores del incidente de hundimiento del buque surcoreano de guerra "Cheonan".
					La agencia rusa transmitio el dia primero su articulo intitulado "Las huellas de EE.UU. dejadas en el 'torpedo norcoreano'" citando a la fuente de exploracion de la flota del Pacifico de Rusia, la cual sostuvo que el "Cheonan" fue naufragado por el torpedo norteamericano.
					
					Las absurdas pruebas publicadas por el "grupo de investigacion" del incidente suscitan serias criticas, comienza el articulo y continua:
					
					En primer lugar, ?por que se incluyeron en el "grupo de investigacion" solo los paises aliados de EE.UU. y no tomaron parte los paises claves como Rusia y China? 
					
					Ademas, el Sur de Corea rehuso sin ninguna razon clara el envio del grupo de inspeccion de la RPDC.
					
					De esta manera, el "grupo de investigacion" pudo interpretar a su albedrio los "restos de torpedo".
					
					Es sospechoso que el torpedo explotado en marzo se haya oxidado demasiado.
					
					Resulta muy extrano tambien que el submarino de la RPDC haya podido esfumarse burlando el sistema de vigilancia satelital, los detectores submarinos y los buques de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea con misiones anti-submarinas, incluyendo el "Cheonan", que habian participado entonces en un ejercicio conjunto y tenian la capacidad de deteccion acustica debajo del mar.
					
					Otros puntos incomprensibles son que las autoridades surcoreanas hayan guardado el silencio durante casi dos meses despues del estallido del incidente y descartado la posibilidad de accidente interno y de explosion de una mina, se hayan salvado todos los oficiales, etc.
					
					Lo mas dificil de comprender es que despues de publicado el "resultado de investigacion", el Sur de Corea se haya mostrado tan histerico hablando del "castigo merecido" y la "represalia" en lugar de dejar mas claros sus argumentos y pruebas y haya retrocedido poco a poco hablando de la "disculpa" y el "castigo al responsable". Ahora ellos intentan hacer de la RPDC el "agresor" instalando los altavoces para inducirla a abrir primero el fuego.
					
					Segun la fuente de exploracion de la flota del Pacifico de Rusia, es cierto que el "Cheonan" fue hundido por el torpedo, pero este no era "del Norte de Corea" sino el torpedo especial lanzado por un submarino atomico ultramoderno de EE.UU. a traves de un pequeno aparato submarino.
					
					La tension de la Peninsula Coreana no conviene al Norte ni al Sur sino resulta provechosa solo a EE.UU.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de desarme nuclear, EE.UU. intenta establecer el sistema de control de armas nucleares del mundo.
					
					Puesto que esta empantanado ahora en Irak y Afganistan, EE.UU. trata de buscar la "otra mano" cambiando su tactica. Especificamente dicho, trata de conservar "su imagen" traspasando al Sur de Corea el cargo de aplastar a la RPDC, y piensa poner en aprieto a China para separarla de Corea.
					
					En su articulo publicado el mismo dia "?El buque 'Cheonan' fue hundido por el torpedo del Norte o del ejercito norteamericano?", el periodico indonesio "Compass" senalo que la causa de siniestro es una incognita y continuo:
					
					En el momento de hundimiento, estaban en plena marcha en la polemica zona maritima el ejercicio militar conjunto Sur de Corea-EE.UU. Por lo tanto, estaba garantizada la seguridad y el buque de guerra "Cheonan" participaba tambien en ese ejercicio.
					
					Resulta absurdo que los buques del Sur de Corea y EE.UU. no se hayan enterado del hundimiento del "Cheonan".
					
					Se presenta ahora la posibilidad de hundimiento del "Cheonan" por un submarino del ejercito norteamericano.
					
					Es necesario recordar que en el dia del accidente, un submarino nuclear de EE.UU., participante en el citado ejercicio militar conjunto, estaba cumpliendo su mision secreta en las aguas cercanas a la isla Paekryong.

articles.title: Iniciada en Nampho la funcion de comedia "Eco de la montana"
articles.content:
Iniciada en Nampho la funcion de comedia "Eco de la montana"
						
  Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ATCC) -- Quedo iniciada desde el dia 5 en la ciudad de Nampho la funcion de la comedia ligera "Eco de la montana", laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					 La vieron en el Teatro de Nampho los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del partido, el Poder y la economia y de las entidades de masas, los creadores, artistas y trabajadores de distintos sectores de esa ciudad.
					
					 Los artistas del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional interpretaron vividamente esa comedia que muestra los sentimientos del campo socialista de Corea y ensena la verdad de la vida.
					
					 La comedia conmovio mucho a los espectadores que vieron en ella entre risas y humor el noble mundo espiritual e ideal y la infatigable lucha del pueblo coreano de la epoca de Chollima.
					
					 En la ocasion los espectadores redoblaron su conviccion de que no habra nada imposible sino podran edificar sin falta en la tierra patria la gran potencia prospera del Juche si trabajan con el optimismo revolucionario y emprendedor modo de lucha proponiendose metas ambiciosas.
					
					 La funcion continua.
